title: Not sure what type is used...
content:
Hi there,

I have attached two images, one of the main copy and one of the “word gala and date”.

Not sure which ones they are.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!! :)

Thanks!

-Antonia

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083402/http:/typophile.com/files/Copy.jpg) | 39.16 KB |
| [gala and date.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083402/http:/typophile.com/files/gala%20and%20date.jpg) | 52.24 KB |

 [‹ Somerfield Supermarket Serif Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43422 "Go to previous forum topic") [THE LOST GIRLS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706083402/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43428 "Go to next forum topic")
author: AntoniaL

comments.content:
“Gala and Date” are Futura, I would guess the book weight.

I think the headers in “Copy” are Futura Bold Condensed.

It’s hard to tell because the image is so small, but I believe the text in “Copy” is Avenir.
